item.description:
New restaurant downtown!!!

Sura Korean & Japanese Cuisine.

 

Walked by this place today and grabbed a menu. Looks scrumptious and the interior is inviting. After dinner, those interested could go to Local 121 for Handsome Pete 80s nite (although there's no guarantee about music or how good this will be, but it has been fun at least once before). Or go to one of many other things to do downtown.

Limiting dinner to 6 for easy conversation. The venue is not big. Anyone is welcome to go to 121 or suggest another restaurant outing and we'd all meet up later.

 

Bring cash! We will not split this evenly, you should pay for what you order.

Please make sure to update your rsvp so those on a waiting list can go. Will try to make a reservation for us, so if you rsvp we expect that you will make it.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP so that we can make Reservation. Meet in doorway.
item.name: Dinner @ SURA Korean Restaurant, Sushi & Bar
